description: A dry toaster pastry coated with solid frosting.  This one is strawberry flavored, what luck!
A dry toaster pastry coated with solid frosting.  This one is blueberry flavored!
A dry toaster pasty, usually coated with solid frosting.  Sadly, this one is not.
A homemade toaster pastry, filled with fruit but lacking icing.

//: Semi-arbitrary spoilage of 60 hours, as the cooked product.
description: A delicious fruit-filled pastry that you can cook in your toaster.  It even comes with frosting!  Cook it to make it tastier.
A delicious fruit-filled pastry that you've cooked.  It even comes with frosting!
A delicious homemade fruit-filled pastry that you've cooked.
A delicious homemade fruit-filled pastry that you've cooked.  It even comes with buttercream!
Smooth, sugary buttercream icing.  Almost good enough to forget the end of everything.
A handful of plain, salted potato chips.
Oh man, you love these chips!  Score!
A handful of tiny, heavily-salted bread twists.  A tasty treat, but they'll make you thirsty.
A handful of tiny bread twists covered in chocolate.
A bar of chocolate from a popular candy brand.  A delicious treat.
A handful of squishy, fluffy, puffy, delicious marshmallows.
A pair of graham crackers with some chocolate and a marshmallow between them.
A handful of peanut butter cups… your favorite!
A handful of colorful chocolate-filled candies.
A handful of colorful fruit-flavored chewy candies.
A handful of colorful fruit- and soda-flavored gummy candies.
A handful of colorful fruit- and soda-flavored vegan gummy candies made from agar instead of animal gelatin.  They have kind of a strange texture, but they're still tasty.
A handful of colorful fruit-flavored chewy candies shaped in a reptilian fashion.  Made by SugarRush.
A handful of chocolate candies shaped like cows.
A swirly confectionary treat in strings of sweet-tasting candy.
Thin paper tubes of sweet & sour candy powder.  Who thinks of this stuff?
A candy bracelet made by stringing candies onto a thread.  In theory, you could both wear and eat the bracelet.
A handful of golden, translucent leaf candies made with pure maple syrup.  They melt slowly in your mouth as you savor the taste of real maple.
These dry, sugary crackers will leave you thirsty, but they go well with some chocolate and marshmallows.
These dry, sugary cracker pellets will leave you thirsty, and they're not the right size to make s'mores with.  Made by SugarRush!
A sweet, delicious cookie, just like grandma used to bake.
A sweet, delicious cookie, shaped like an egg.  Made by SugarRush!
Boiling the sap of a maple tree has concentrated it into this sweet, delicious maple syrup.
A thick syrup produced from shredded sugar beets.  Useful in cooking as a sweetener.
A simple syrup, made of just sugar and water.  Used usually as a sweetener for stuff like cocktails.
A syrup made from corn.
Delicious sponge cake with buttercream icing.  Happy Birthday is written on top in frosting.
Delicious chocolate cake.  It has all the icing.  All of it.
A cake coated in the thickest icing you've ever seen.  Someone has written guff in quotation marks on it…
This unholy confection of delight does not lie, it packs a heavenly amount of calories in each sinful bite.  For debug use only.
Roasted coffee beans coated with dark chocolate, a natural source of concentrated caffeine.
Salty, deep-fried potatoes from a fast food restaurant.
Homemade deep-fried potatoes or other tubers, with a touch of salt.  Crunchy and delicious.
A handful of soft, chocolate-covered peppermint patties… yum!
A handful of candy wafers in assorted flavors: orange, lemon, lime, clove, chocolate, wintergreen, cinnamon, and licorice.  Yum!
Flavored sugar sticks designed to look like cigarettes.  Anti-smoking reports from the Surgeon General have caused a pretty big drop in their popularity since the 1960s.
Some caramel.  Sticky and sweet, but not very exciting by itself.
A caramel-covered apple.  Best served on an autumn day, at a harvest fair, on a stick - but those days are long gone.
Betcha can't eat just one.
Salted chips made from corn tortillas.  They're not bad on their own, but they could really use some cheese, maybe some meat.
Salted chips made from corn tortillas, with cheese melted on top.  Could stand to have some meat.
Salted chips made from corn tortillas, with ground meat on top.  Could probably use some cheese, though.
Salted chips made from corn tortillas smothered in cheese and ground meat.  Delicious.
Salted chips made from corn tortillas, with beans on top.  Could probably use some cheese, though.
Salted chips made from corn tortillas, smothered in cheese and beans.  Delicious, even if you're not a vegetarian.
Salty dried pork.  Tastes good, but it will make you thirsty.
A small, microwavable steak & cheese burrito, like those found at gas stations.
Now with ONE POUND of meat and ONE POUND of carbs!  Not as appetizing as it would be if heated up.
Now with ONE POUND of meat and ONE POUND of carbs!  Now that it's been heated up, it's much tastier but will also spoil more quickly.
Fast-food chicken, deep-fried in oil.  It's greasy and delicious.
A hot dog with chili con carne on top.  Yum!
A heavily processed sausage, dipped in batter and deep-fried.  It would taste much better cooked.
A heavily processed sausage, dipped in batter and deep-fried.  Now that it's been cooked, this corn dog tastes much better, but will spoil faster.
A homemade sausage, dipped in batter and deep fried.
Fluffy and delicious pancakes with real maple syrup, with delicious chocolate baked right in.
Crunchy and delicious waffles with real maple syrup, with delicious chocolate baked right in.
Processed cheese spread.
Fried potatoes with delicious cheese smothered on top.
Battered and fried onions.  Crunchy and delicious.
A heavily processed sausage, commonplace at baseball games before the Cataclysm.  It would taste much better cooked.
A simple hot dog, cooked over an open fire.  Would be better on a bun, but it's quite an improvement over eating it uncooked.
Surprisingly, not made from dog.  Now that it's been cooked, this hot dog tastes much better, but will spoil faster.
What's better than a hot dog?  A hot dog smothered in ground meat and chopped onions, of course!
//: The fun value is high to justify crafting this versus a normal hot dog.

description: Crunchy sugar in chocolate capsules.  The malt gives them a distinct, yet delicious flavor.
Peanuts coated in a sweet, crunchy candy coating.  A regional delicacy.
//: Based on a New England candy called Boston Baked Beans

description: A sealed plastic bag containing a full dehydrated meal.  This one contains a hearty beef and egg breakfast.
A rehydrated beef and egg breakfast meal meant for camping or hiking.
A thick, dense bar of military chocolate.  While tough to chew and not very appetizing, it provides almost a day's worth of calories in portable form.
A serving of sugary, fruit-flavored gelatin dessert powder.  Just add water and set.

name: unflavored gelatin dessert
description: An unflavored jiggly, sugary treat made from gelatin and sugar.  It would taste better with some flavor.

name: processed gelatin dessert
description: A jiggly, sugary, fruit-flavored treat made from boxed mix.  A kid favorite pre-Cataclysm.

name: homemade gelatin dessert
description: A homemade jiggly, sugary treat made from gelatin and sugar, flavored with fruit juice.  A kid favorite pre-Cataclysm.

name: fruit filled gelatin dessert
description: A jiggly, sugary treat made from gelatin and sugar, flavored with fruit juice and set with fruit.  A kid favorite pre-Cataclysm and a healthy treat.

name: vegan gelatin dessert
description: A vegan friendly homemade jiggly, sugary treat made from agar and sugar, flavored with fruit juice.  A kid favorite pre-Cataclysm.  They'll never know the difference.

name: fruit filled vegan gelatin dessert
description: A vegan friendly jiggly, sugary treat made from agar and sugar, flavored with fruit juice and set with fruit.  A kid favorite pre-Cataclysm and a healthy treat.
A famous Italian pasta dish made with egg, pecorino and bacon.
A famous Italian pasta dish made with red sauce, pecorino and bacon.
Krampouezh, known worldwide as 'crepe' is a traditional, thin Breton pancake.
Krampouezh, known worldwide as 'crepe' is a traditional, thin Breton pancake.
Delicious and creamy delight, half of the famous Fluffernutter.
